item.content:encoded:
Easter Bunny Rabbit Bird Colorful Floral Pretty Holiday Card

Big Deals! Easter Bunny Rabbit Bird Colorful Floral Pretty Holiday Card – Easter Cards Easter Bunny Rabbit Bird Colorful Floral Pretty Holiday Card products with good quality, you can be confident Easter Bunny Rabbit Bird Colorful Floral Pretty Holiday Card quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same categoryA pretty Easter card! On a light blue background, the rich colors on my bunny rabbit and bird floral painting seem to glow! The artwork was originally hand painted on ceramic tile with ceramic underglazes, glazed and kiln fired for a unique look and depth of shading. The stylized flowers were inspired by old Jacobean floral designs. My gray bunny rabbit greets a goldfinch and bluebird, and a snail hides by its feet. The reverse of the card features the artwork as a border. The inset area has the upbeat folk greeting, "May this season bring you joys as long as a rabbit’s ears, and troubles as short as its tail" with "Happy Easter." There’s plenty of room for a hand written note and signature. This flat card would be a cute and affordable way to brighten someone’s spring! Whimsical, unique, original artwork & design by Tuzi Williams. Price:$1.91

Big Deals! Easter Bunny Rabbit Bird Colorful Floral Pretty Holiday Card ($1.91)
